title: Earn RP by helping me.
body:
If anyone can help me fix "There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client." error, I will reward him with 1380 RP gift card.

Skype: [REDACTED]

replies.body: You need to have the shortcut on your desktop, if it is on the taskbar it will create an error

It sounds like your network is having trouble connecting to our servers, but fear not!  I don't recommend changing any of your game files, as that could cause more trouble!  As a first step, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!  !  Make sure to go through each step as it will cover a variety of different factors and strengthen your connection!  

I can has RP?  Will help for poro snax!

You're probably using the wrong shortcut to start your LoL.
When you click LoL to open, you should open up to the screen with Server Selection (EUW/EUNE/ETC) and news visible. If you're going straight to the logon screen, it's the wrong shortcut you're using. You'll find the correct one in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends (Lol.launcher.admin or something).
Didn't help, but I have Riot Games/lollauncher.admin on my second hard drive. Could it be the problem?

I had this problem when i was running the LoL launcher without running it as an administrator.

I do not know the exact cause, but that was what fixed it for me earlier.

Also, if you click on the LoL icon to start it, and you immediately get the login screen, the error can also pop up. Always make sure you start the game via the launcher.

Those are the only things i know to prevent this error.
